ygData.msgSnippet: StriderZero, please don t controll the Cybertronian Fire, it has much more than just autoguns. ... The Cybertronian Fire detects two Predacons near it, opening

StriderZero, please don't controll the Cybertronian Fire, it has much more 
than just autoguns.

::Cybertronian Fire/Grimmler/Prowl::

The Cybertronian Fire detects two Predacons near it, opening fire on one as 
it flies by, and then turning on the other. Two missile launchers swirl to 
fire 2 signature-seeking missiles each at Koj. 4 laser batteries, and the 
autoguns also open fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler exits the Cybertronian Fire, barely making out a bot crawling on the 
ground. He growls. Its signature was Predacon.

Pulling out a heavy-fire rifle, Grimmler opens fire on the Predacon, aiming 
two shots at its head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl exits the Cybertronian Fire, seeing Grimmler and the defences firing on 
a bot.

"Can you take care of it?" Prowl asks, flying up to Grimmler.

Grimmler nods, continuing to fire. "Yeah, go help Firearm."

Nodding, Prowl turns around, flying off toward the swamp.
